æ¯”å¯¹å³å¯ã€‚ä¸å¤Ÿå®‰å…¨ã€‚æ„Ÿå…´è¶£å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä¸‹SaslServerPlainImplç±»çš„evaluateResponseæ–¹æ³•ã€‚ saslStatus = SASLAuthentication.handle(session, doc);} else if (startedSASL && "response".equals(tag) || "abort".equals(tag)) { saslStatus = SASLAuthentication.handle(session, doc);} åˆ¤æ–­xmlæµçš„ç±»å‹æ˜¯authåï¼Œä¼šè°ƒç”¨SASLAuthentication.handle()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå…¶å®ä¹‹åå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘æ¥çš„responseæµæˆ–abortæµä¹Ÿæ˜¯è°ƒç”¨è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ã€‚handleæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ä¼šåˆ¤æ–­è¯¥xmlæµæ˜¯authè¿˜æ˜¯responseã€‚1234567891011121314switch ( ElementType.valueOfCaseInsensitive( doc.getName() ) ) { case ABORT: throw new SaslFailureException( Failure.ABORTED ); case AUTH: ... SaslServer saslServer = Sasl.createSaslServer( mechanismName, "xmpp", serverName, props, new XMPPCallbackHandler() ); ... session.setSessionData( "SaslServer", saslServer ); ... case RESPONSE: // Either a challenge or success data. final byte[] challenge = saslServer.evaluateResponse( decoded ); åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯authåï¼Œä¸»è¦å°±æ˜¯åˆ›å»ºäº†SaslserveræœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œä¼šæ ¹æ®ä¹‹å‰æ‰€é€‰çš„SASLéªŒè¯æœºåˆ¶åˆ›å»ºå¯¹åº”çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚æ­¤å¤„åˆ›å»ºçš„æ˜¯ScramSha1SaslServeræœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œåœ¨SaslServerFactoryImplç±»çš„createSaslServeræ–¹æ³•ä¸­åˆ›å»ºï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š12345678910111213case "PLAIN": return new SaslServerPlainImpl( protocol, serverName, props, cbh );case "SCRAM-SHA-1": return new ScramSha1SaslServer();case "ANONYMOUS": return new AnonymousSaslServer( session );case "EXTERNAL": if ( session instanceof LocalClientSession ) return new ExternalClientSaslServer( (LocalClientSession) session ); if ( session instanceof LocalIncomingServerSession ) return new ExternalServerSaslServer( (LocalIncomingServerSession) session );case JiveSharedSecretSaslServer.NAME: return new JiveSharedSecretSaslServer(); ScramSha1SaslServerç±»ä¼šåœ¨æ”¶åˆ°authæµåå‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€challengeæµï¼Œä¹‹åå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä¼šå‘å‡ºåº”ç­”æµresponseï¼Œç»è¿‡SASLAuthentication.handle()æ–¹æ³•å¤„ç†åä¹Ÿæ˜¯äº¤ç»™ScramSha1SaslServerç±»è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ã€‚ â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”å‰æ–¹æåº¦é«˜èƒ½â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”12345678910111213141516171819202122private State state = State.INITIAL; //stateåˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶çš„çŠ¶æ€...switch (state) { case INITIAL: challenge = generateServerFirstMessage(response); state = State.IN_PROGRESS; //æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€challengeåçŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸ºIN_PROGRESS break; case IN_PROGRESS: challenge = generateServerFinalMessage(response); state = State.COMPLETE; //æœåŠ¡å™¨éªŒè¯å®ŒresponseåçŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸ºCOMPLETE break; case COMPLETE: if (response == null || response.length == 0) { challenge = new byte[0]; break; } default: throw new SaslException("No response expected in state " + state); } step4 generateServerFirstMessageæ–¹æ³•è´Ÿè´£å¯¹authæµè¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†å¹¶å‘å‡ºchallengeæµã€‚12345678910111213private byte[] generateServerFirstMessage(final byte[] response) throws SaslException { String clientFirstMessage = new String(response, StandardCharsets.UTF_8); Matcher m = CLIENT_FIRST_MESSAGE.matcher(clientFirstMessage); if (!m.matches()) { throw new SaslException("Invalid first client message"); } clientFirstMessageBare = m.group(5); username = m.group(6); //ä»authæµä¸­å¾—åˆ°ç”¨æˆ·å String clientNonce = m.group(7); //ä»authæµä¸­å¾—åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯éšæœºæ•° nonce = clientNonce + UUID.randomUUID().toString(); //å¯¹å®¢æˆ·ç«¯éšæœºæ•°å†æ¬¡éšæœºï¼Œä¹‹åä¼šå¯¹å…¶éªŒè¯ serverFirstMessage = String.format("r=%s,s=%s,i=%d", nonce, DatatypeConverter.printBase64Binary(getSalt(username)),getIterations(username)); //å‡†å¤‡å‘ç»™å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„challengeæµ return serverFirstMessage.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);} challengeæµå†…å®¹ï¼šr=æœåŠ¡ç«¯éšæœºæ•°(å®¢æˆ·ç«¯éšæœºæ•°+UUID)s=salt(base64ç¼–ç çš„ç›ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨åœ¨openfirefæœåŠ¡ç«¯æ•°æ®åº“çš„ofUserè¡¨ä¸­)i =è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•°(å­˜å‚¨åœ¨openfirefæœåŠ¡ç«¯æ•°æ®åº“çš„ofUserè¡¨ä¸­) 123<challenge ã€ä»æœåŠ¡å™¨challengeæµä¸­è·å¾—çš„ç›å’Œè¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å‡ºä¸€äº›æ•°å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶ä½œä¸ºresponseæµå‘ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨å»éªŒè¯ã€‚123456789101112clientFinalMessageBare = "c=biws,r=æœåŠ¡ç«¯éšæœºæ•°"saltedPassword = PBKDF2-SHA-1(normalizedPassword, salt, i)clientKey = HMAC-SHA-1(saltedPassword, "å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¯†é’¥")storedKey = SHA-1(clientKey)authMessage = authæµå†…å®¹+","+challengeæµå†…å®¹+","clientFinalMessageBareclientSignature = HMAC-SHA-1(storedKey, authMessage)clientProof = clientKey å¼‚æˆ– clientSignatureserverKey = HMAC-SHA-1(saltedPassword, "æœåŠ¡ç«¯å¯†é’¥")serverSignature = HMAC-SHA-1(serverKey, authMessage)clientFinalMessage = clientFinalMessageBare",p="base64(clientProof)"å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¯¹clientFinalMessageè¿›è¡Œbase64ç¼–ç å¹¶å°†å…¶ä½œä¸ºresponseæµå‘é€ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨ responseæµå†…å®¹ï¼šc=biwsr=æœåŠ¡ç«¯éšæœºæ•°p=base64(clientProof)123<response xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl'>Yz1iaXdzLHI9I2FNNFZ4d2M7ZnNyRnYze25efEcxWVNZbDNAR0IjVVowNzMwM2M4MC1jNmE3LTRkYzAtYmZlMi1lYzgzZWJiZmNhZTAscD1QdUE5OGVSVXBBSGhqa2EwdDJ3dVQ1TFBvU1k9</response>è§£ç åå†…å®¹ä¸ºï¼šc=biws,r=#aM4Vxwc;fsrFv3{n^|G1YSYl3@GB#UZ07303c80-c6a7-4dc0-bfe2-ec83ebbfcae0,p=PuA98eRUpAHhjka0t2wuT5LPoSY= step6 ScramSha1SaslServerç±»çš„generateServerFinalMessageæ–¹æ³•è´Ÿè´£å¯¹responseæµè¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ï¼ŒéªŒè¯é€šè¿‡ä¼šå‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€successæµã€‚generateServerFinalMessageæ–¹æ³•æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç ï¼š1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738String clientFinalMessage = new String(response, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);Matcher m = CLIENT_FINAL_MESSAGE.matcher(clientFinalMessage);String clientFinalMessageWithoutProof = m.group(1);String clientNonce = m.group(3); //å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘æ¥çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨éšæœºæ•°String proof = m.group(4); //base64(clientProof) if (!nonce.equals(clientNonce)) { //éªŒè¯æœåŠ¡å™¨ä¹‹å‰ç”Ÿæˆçš„éšæœºæ•°å’Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘æ¥çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨éšæœºæ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ throw new SaslException("Client final message has incorrect nonce value"); } try { String authMessage = clientFirstMessageBare + "," + serverFirstMessage + "," + clientFinalMessageWithoutProof; byte[] storedKey = getStoredKey( username ); //æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·åæŸ¥æ‰¾æœåŠ¡ç«¯å­˜å‚¨çš„storedKey if (storedKey == null) { throw new SaslException("No stored key for user '"+username+"'"); } byte[] serverKey = getServerKey(username); //æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·åæŸ¥æ‰¾æœåŠ¡ç«¯å­˜å‚¨çš„serverKey if (serverKey == null) { throw new SaslException("No server key for user '"+username+"'"); } byte[] clientSignature = ScramUtils.computeHmac(storedKey, authMessage); byte[] serverSignature = ScramUtils.computeHmac(serverKey, authMessage); byte[] clientKey = clientSignature.clone(); byte[] decodedProof = DatatypeConverter.parseBase64Binary(proof); for (int i = 0; i < clientKey.length; i++) { clientKey[i] ^= decodedProof[i]; //å°†clientProofä¸clientSignatureè¿›è¡Œå¼‚æˆ–ï¼Œè¿˜åŸå‡ºclientKey } //å°†æœåŠ¡ç«¯å­˜å‚¨çš„storedKeyå’ŒclientKeyç»SHA-1ç®—æ³•å¾—åˆ°å€¼è¿›è¡Œæ¯”å¯¹ if (!Arrays.equals(storedKey, MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-1").digest(clientKey))) { throw new SaslException("Authentication failed"); } //æ¯”å¯¹æˆåŠŸåˆ™è¡¨æ˜éªŒè¯æˆåŠŸï¼Œå‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€successæµ return ("v=" + DatatypeConverter.printBase64Binary(serverSignature)) .getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8); â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”-å…³é”®ç‚¹â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”-å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šclientKey å¼‚æˆ– clientSignature = clientProofæœåŠ¡ç«¯ï¼šclientProofå¼‚æˆ–clientSignature=clientKeyï¼Œä¾¿å¯è¿˜åŸå‡ºclientKeyã€‚å†å°†æœåŠ¡ç«¯å­˜å‚¨çš„storedKeyå’ŒclientKeyç»SHA-1ç®—æ³•å¾—åˆ°å€¼è¿›è¡Œæ¯”å¯¹ï¼Œå³å¯å®ŒæˆéªŒè¯ã€‚ successæµå†…å®¹ï¼šv=base64(serverSignature)123<success xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl">dj1WZUtxOFFTRFBTbXdaNUM2V1hvanZTTzJwdTA9</success>è§£ç åå†…å®¹ä¸ºï¼šv=VeKq8QSDPSmwZ5C6WXojvSO2pu0=
